about_the_game:
A collection of high resolution artworks from the game Chronicles of Taldun: The Remainder.

Features:

  • 1 'slice' wallpaper

  • 6 bonus artworks not appearing in the game

  • 11 backgrounds

  • 41 scene artworks

  • Art booklet with behind the scenes and a sneak peak at our creative process.

*The dimensions differ from file to file, but they are all around 4k. Jpg format.

Artist: Nim of the Square Weasel Studio (Ze helped too!)

Special thanks to Sarianne for helping me sketch the (almost)kissing scene. <3

♡♡

To find the files:

1. Open Steam, go to the Library tab, and right-click on The Remainder Act 1 in your game list.

2. Select Properties and click the Local Files tab.

3. Click the Browse... button.

4. Open the "FanPack" folder!

Permissions

By purchasing this collection you receive permission to use and print these artworks for personal use only. You are not allowed do modify, share or use this art for any commercial purposes.
